005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * A Metapath atomic item containing a Base64 encoded data value.
017 */
018public interface IBase64BinaryItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
019
020  /**
021   * Construct a new base64 encoded byte sequence item using the provided string
022   * {@code value}.
023   *
024   * @param value
025   *          a string representing base64 encoded data
026   * @return the new item
027   */
028  @NonNull
029  static IBase64BinaryItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
030    return cast(IStringItem.valueOf(value));
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Construct a new URI base64 encoded byte sequence using the provided
035   * {@link ByteBuffer} {@code value}.
036   *
037   * @param value
038   *          a byte buffer
039   * @return the new item
040   */
041  @NonNull
042  static IBase64BinaryItem valueOf(@NonNull ByteBuffer value) {
043    return new Base64BinaryItemImpl(value);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
048   *
049   * @param item
050   *          the item to cast
051   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
052   *         cast to this type
053   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
054   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
055   */
056  @NonNull
057  static IBase64BinaryItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
058    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.BASE64.cast(item);
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  default IBase64BinaryItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
063    return cast(item);
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Get the "wrapped" byte buffer value.
068   *
069   * @return the underlying byte buffer value
070   */
071  @NonNull
072  ByteBuffer asByteBuffer();
073
074  @Override
075  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
076    return compareTo(cast(item));
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Compares this value with the argument.
081   *
082   * @param item
083   *          the item to compare with this value
084   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
085   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
086   */
087  default int compareTo(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem item) {
088    return asByteBuffer().compareTo(item.asByteBuffer());
089  }
090}
